channel.title: SageMaker Script Mode on Get Started on Amazon SageMaker
channel.description: Recent content in SageMaker Script Mode on Get Started on Amazon SageMaker

item.title: Word-level language modeling using PyTorch
item.description: Contents Background Setup Data Train Host Background This example trains a multi-layer LSTM RNN model on a language modeling task based on PyTorch example. By default, the training script uses the Wikitext-2 dataset. We will train a model on SageMaker, deploy it, and then use deployed model to generate new text. For more information about the PyTorch in SageMaker, please visit sagemaker-pytorch-containers and sagemaker-python-sdk github repositories. Setup This notebook was created and tested on an ml.
